name: Classic American Cheeseburger
description: Juicy Angus beef patty topped with melted American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, red onion, and house special sauce on a toasted sesame bun.

name: Smoky BBQ Bacon Burger
description: Flame-grilled beef patty covered in smoky barbecue sauce, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, onion rings, and sliced pickles on a brioche bun.

name: Spicy Jalapeño Fiesta Burger
description: Beef patty with pepper jack cheese, jalapeños, pickled red onions, chipotle mayo, and fresh avocado, served on a corn-dusted bun.

name: Mushroom Swiss Gourmet
description: Savory beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, caramelized onions, and garlic aioli on a potato roll.

name: Southern Fried Chicken Burger
description: Crispy buttermilk fried chicken breast, tangy coleslaw, spicy mayo, and dill pickles stacked on a soft bun.

name: Cali Veggie Supreme
description: Grilled veggie patty with melted provolone, fresh sprouts, tomato, red onion, cucumber, and herb aioli on a multigrain bun. (Vegetarian)

name: Spiced Chickpea Vegan Burger
description: Crispy spiced chickpea patty topped with vegan tzatziki, arugula, sliced tomato, pickled cucumbers, and red onion on a vegan bun. (Vegan)

name: Tokyo Teriyaki Fusion Burger
description: Seared beef patty glazed with teriyaki sauce, grilled pineapple, wasabi mayo, crisp lettuce, and sesame seeds on a toasted bun.

name: Mediterranean Lamb Burger
description: Juicy lamb patty with feta cheese, tzatziki, grilled eggplant, arugula, and tomato on a ciabatta roll.

name: Gluten-Free Avocado Turkey Burger
description: Grilled turkey patty topped with sliced avocado, pepper jack cheese, lettuce, tomato, and honey mustard, served on a gluten-free bun. (Gluten-Free)
